import { useReducer } from "react"; import "./style.css" const ACTIONS = { ADD_DIGIT: 'add-digit', CHOOSE_OPERATION: 'choose-operation', CLEAR: 'clear', DELETE_DIGIT: 'add-digit', EVALUATE:'evaluate' } function reducer(state, action){ } function App() { const[{ currentperand, previousOperand, operation}, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, {}) return (
{previousOperand} {operation}
{currentperand}
); } export default App;
